string.text: I can perceive you. I see you, I hear you. Wherever you go. You shall not pass.
Crap, of course the door's locked. You know, the code to the back entrance was 26041986, maybe it's the same here. Give it a try.
I can sense your presence, stalker. Come to me, we need to talk.
You're nothing but a damn traitor.
Oh, mighty Monolith. Even in death, I serve. Eternal.
Even from beyond the grave, I shall cast the light of Vyraj... upon this sinful world.
